title: Can't leftclick on Minimap
body:
I couldn't find any thread about this specific problem and I hope that you can help me fixing this issue.
As the title says I am not able to leftclick the minimap to move the camera on a specific spot. It works when starting the game but after let's say 10 minutes ingame it doesn't. I have no idea why this "bug" occurs and I hope that maybe someone used to have the same problem and could fix it somehow. This is especially frustrating when I play Twisted Fate and can't insta-click to let's say botlane to use my ult and gank. I have to move the cursor all the way down, which costs too much time and maybe lead to an unsuccesful gank because I wasn't able to react or to ult faster. Same problem if playing jungle and want to have an overview of how the lanes are going and if someone needs help. This is really annoying :( I tried to repair the client and even download the whole thing again after deinstalling completely but it didn't help unfortunately.

replies.body: I've seen input issues like this with modifications to game files or even hardware.  I can't say for sure in your specific case, so hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can take a look.  I know this has been annoying, and I appreciate the troubleshooting you've done so far.  We'll respond and help out as spoon as we can!

Hey I came here to say that Im having the same problem. Porocles I hope you read this for now-- I had some weird stuff going on. My mouse sensativity was reset to 50, however my camera was still set to semi-locked which is my preference. I was not able to left-click on my minimap, just like AidsOnMyFeet. I tried messing with the camera settings and alt+tabbing but I had no luck. I was playing yesterday early morning and did not have this problem. There was a mini-update today and Im guessing this problem is related. I did a quick google search with the time stamp set to past 24 hrs and this post came up- it probably has to do with the mini update. Im repairing my client as we speak and if that doesnt fix it i will send in a ticket. For the record Im not using nay cheats or anything but I did have a low-res rift skin installed for a while. It was uninstalled yesterday though. Ty

Are you using any third party programs or modifications?  For example if you have apps like overlays it may have had a patch which can cause issues.    Additionally, try force resetting your settings one more time to force an update to the servers to try and get this fixed.  

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Let me know if that works.

I had the same problem. 
This solution did not help, however something very similar. 

Actually exactly the same except after second logging to Custom, I restored all settings to defaults. Then it started to work. 
(interesting is that when I just deleted the config file, it did not work. When I just restored to defaults it also did not. Together it, however, started working :) )
